Title: New Tory leader Liz Truss pays tribute to outgoing Prime Minister Boris Johnson - BBC News
Info: in her first speech after being elected as leader of the conservative party, new tory leader liz truss pays tribute to the outgoing prime minister boris johnson. "you're admired from kyiv to carlisle", said truss of her friend boris johnson. she also paid tribute to her rival rishi sunak. live: liz truss to be next uk prime minister © 2022 bbc. the bbc is not responsible for the content of external sites. read about our approach to external linking.
